meanings.definition: To utter a long, loud, mournful cry like that of a cat.
meanings.sent1: The cat yowled loudly in the night, waking up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The stray cat yowled outside my window, looking for food.
meanings.sent3: When the cat yowled at the vacuum cleaner, it seemed like it was telling it to go away.
meanings.sent4: The wind yowled through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere in the forest.
meanings.sent5: As the thunderstorm approached, the cat yowled in fear, seeking shelter.
